comments:
Description:
SWTException when undo cut action in attached design file.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached design file.
2. Collapse table item in Outline
3. Select table and grid in Outline and right click and click Cut.
4. Click Layout Editor and click Undo in context menu.

Result:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2942)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2865)

	at org.eclipse.jface.action.Action.runWithEvent(Action.java:996)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection(ActionContributionItem.java:538)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$2(ActionContributionItem.java:488)

The design file has been modified after submitted this bug, so it may take time to find out the reproduce way. I will contact with Dazhen about this.
This may be a corner case. I can't reproduce the issue mentioned her.  Defer to 2.1 for further investigation.
Please resolve this if can not reproduce anymore.
